about_the_game:
Shimapanzer Strike is a turn based tactical RPG where you will command and train your squad of wolfgirls, and watch their skills and friendships blossom through battle as you fight a ruthless invader determined to harvest your world's resources and enslave your entire race.

Control a wide variety of unit classes, from big heavy tanks, to swift infantry scouts, to long range artillery, to mysterious magical girls, victory can only be achieved by using each classes strengths to their fullest while keeping casualties to a minimum.

In between missions there's still lots to be done. Spend some time with your squad. Schedule some extra training for your squadmates, help them clean their tanks, bond over a hot meal in the mess hall, pat their heads, and many other activities that will help your squad be at its best for future battles!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains non-sexual nudity, extreme violence, blood, and depictions of death.

short_description: At Knight's Cross Academy, the most prestigious military academy on the continent of Lykaia, you will learn the military tactics needed to effectively command your squad of tanks, infantry, and magical girls to defeat a ruthless enemy only interested in the total subjugation of your world and race.
